title: Best of The Program | Guest: Dr. Benjamin Merkle | 7/15/20
description:
From the "1619 Project" to renaming businesses, our history is changing rapidly. When is the average American going to have a “second tower” moment and realize we’re under attack from the radical Left? In today’s news that only makes sense when you’re drunk, Chicago’s mayor calls on her own version of Batman to fix the city’s Census problem. New Saint Andrews College President Dr. Benjamin Merkle joins to discuss how college campuses have become the “ultimate deep state” and what we must start teaching again.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
